com.esri.mo2.map.dpy
Class BaseLayerExtension

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.dpy.BaseLayerExtension
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, LayerExtension
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseExtractExtension, BaseGeoCodeExtension, BaseStoredQueryExtension
public abstract class BaseLayerExtension
extends Object
implements LayerExtension

This helper class provides infrastructure for accessing the Layer that a LayerExtension is added to.

See Also:
Layer.setExtension(com.esri.mo2.map.dpy.LayerExtension)
